participant_1.background:

i can also squat 400 pounds.
I enjoy making things for my family.
i live in texas.
i am allergic to dust.

I enjoy listening to Nightwish to remind myself that I can accomplish anything if I set my mind to it.

i work in marketing , and i love it.

content.text: Doing well, thanks. I have been thinking about how to make some designer French fries. I love them and want to make a special batch. Do you have any tips?
I love French fries too! What kind are you thinking about making?
I was thinking about making some with a garlic aioli sauce. Do you think that would be good?
That sounds delicious! I love aioli sauce.
Me too! I think it would be great with some crispy fries.
I bet it would! I might have to try that myself.
You should! I think it would be a hit.
No problem! I'm always happy to share my favorite recipes.
I'm glad! I love trying new things.
Me too! It's the best way to find new favorites.
